data.client_settings: [Desktop App] Release Channel: stable, Build Number: 11724; [Android App] 6.3.2 (632)
data.actual_result: Theme of Scroll Bar (in the Pinned Section, on Desktop App) does not change
data.expected_result: The desktop app's theme completely changes
data.short_description: Scroll Bar in pinned section doesn't change colour
data.steps_to_repro: - Open Discord Android App and Desktop App - Use the same theme (Light or Dark) on both apps - Enable "Sync across clients" in the Appearance section in Android app - On the desktop app, go to a text channel which has a lot of pinned messages - Open "Pinned Messages" section (Desktop App) - If you were using Dark theme till now, click on "Light" in the mobile app; if you were using Light theme till now, click on "Dark" in the mobile app
